Temecula.Pechanga Resort & Casino:
The Pechanga Resort & Casino is an Indian Casino on the Pechanga Indian Reservation in Temecula, California. Pechanga Resort & Casino is the largest casino in the state of California, with 3,400 slot machines and approximately 188,000 sq ft (17,500 m2) of gaming space.


== History ==
On June 24, 2002, the $262 million Pechanga Resort & Casino opened its doors.
